action.action-desc: Mr. Steube introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To provide that participation in the American Community Survey is voluntary.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Freedom from Government Surveys Act.

section.header: Voluntary nature of American Community Survey

subsection.header: No penalty for failure To respond
subsection.text: Section 221 of title 13, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Voluntary nature of American Community Survey
subsection.text: Subsection (a) shall not apply to any person who refuses or neglects to answer any question on the American Community Survey (or any successor survey).

subsection.header: Clarification of voluntary nature on survey
subsection.text: Section 193 of title 13, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

subsection.header: Clarification of voluntary nature of American Community Survey
subsection.text: The Secretary shall include on the American Community Survey (or any successor survey) a statement that participation in the survey is voluntary.
